footer.rights: All rights reserved. Strong. Elegant. Jegr Jalal.

homepage.heroSubtitle: High Quality. Guarantee. Excellent Local Manufacturer.
homepage.aboutText1: Jegr Jalal Company is Iraq's premier construction and infrastructure development firm, dedicated to building sustainable urban solutions that stand the test of time.
homepage.aboutText2: From landscaping and road development to specialized concrete work and security installations, we deliver comprehensive solutions that enhance urban life across Iraq.
homepage.servicesDesc: Comprehensive construction and infrastructure solutions tailored to meet Iraq's urban development needs.
homepage.projectsDesc: Discover our most impactful infrastructure projects that have transformed Iraqi cities.
homepage.contactDesc: Get in touch with our expert team to discuss your next construction or infrastructure project. We're here to bring your vision to life with our proven expertise and commitment to excellence.

servicesPage.heroDesc: Comprehensive construction and infrastructure services designed to build stronger, more beautiful communities across Iraq.
servicesPage.ctaDesc: Our team is ready to discuss your specific requirements and create a tailored solution that meets your unique needs and budget.

projectsPage.heroDesc: Discover our portfolio of successful infrastructure projects that have transformed communities across Iraq.
projectsPage.noProjects: No projects found for the selected category.
projectsPage.ctaDesc: Let's discuss how we can help transform your infrastructure vision into reality. Our experienced team is ready to deliver exceptional results.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.visionText: To be Iraq's leading provider of innovative, sustainable, and elegant urban solutions.
aboutPage.missionText: To deliver high-quality construction and infrastructure projects that enhance communities and improve lives across Iraq.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.intro: We'd love to hear from you! Reach out to our team for any inquiries, project discussions, or support.
contactPage.contactInfoIntro: Our team is available to assist you with your needs. Find our contact details below.
contactPage.quickResponseGuaranteeDescription: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.
contactPage.faqIntro: Find answers to common questions about our services, process, and company.
contactPage.faq1Question: How do I request a project quote?
contactPage.faq1Answer: You can request a quote by filling out our contact form or emailing quotes@jegrjalal.com. Our team will get back to you promptly.
contactPage.faq2Answer: We serve clients across all regions of Iraq, with a focus on major cities and urban areas.
contactPage.faq3Question: What types of projects do you handle?
contactPage.faq3Answer: We handle a wide range of construction and infrastructure projects, including landscaping, roadworks, concrete, lighting, and security installations.

form.formTitleMessage: Send us a message and our team will get back to you soon.
